column2:
"I-I'm sorry.
You'll probably hear me out, but
I'm always making ludicrous requests..."

"But...but, since you've helped
me out with my reports so much so far,
I want to finish them off strong."

"This time, I want some data for when
the Quartz Dragon becomes
a boost hostile."

"Sorry, I beg you.
I'll wait here for you."
